channel.title: [Priest Suggestion]
channel.description: When priest revives someone they should be able to privately talk to them, even when converted. This could be done in day chat as well. This would make priest even more fun and not really a one use ability character.

item.title: [Priest Suggestion]
item.dc:creator: Fruit
item.description:
i don’t think they have, you can whisper people. but this is completely private my idea. no like notifcation will be showed and it can also be done at night
